manifest.name: Content Trend Scanner
manifest.description: Monitors Google Trends, Pinterest, and TikTok for rising topics in a specified niche.

manifest.name: YouTube Idea Generator
manifest.description: Analyzes popular video titles in a niche and generates new title ideas using AI.

manifest.name: Content Calendar Sync
manifest.description: Syncs the Flowork content schedule to Google Calendar, Notion, or Trello.

manifest.name: Keyword Researcher
manifest.description: Fetches search volume and competition data for a list of keywords.

manifest.name: Audience Comment Scraper
manifest.description: Scrapes recent comments from YouTube, Instagram, or TikTok to find content ideas or FAQs.

manifest.name: AI Script Writer
manifest.description: Creates a draft script for a video or blog post based on a given outline and keywords.

manifest.name: AI Image Generator
manifest.description: Generates images (thumbnails, visual assets) from a text description using Stable Diffusion or DALL-E.

manifest.name: AI Voiceover Generator
manifest.description: Converts a text script into an audio file (Text-to-Speech) with various voice options.

manifest.name: AI Article Writer
manifest.description: Writes a complete blog article from a title and a few key points.

manifest.name: Video Silence Remover
manifest.description: Automatically cuts silent parts from a video or audio recording.

manifest.name: Auto Subtitle Generator
manifest.description: Transcribes audio from a video and generates a subtitle file (SRT) using Whisper.

manifest.name: Intro/Outro Stamper
manifest.description: Automatically adds intro and outro video clips to a main video file.

manifest.name: Watermark Adder
manifest.description: Adds a logo or watermark to videos or images in bulk.

manifest.name: Video Format Converter
manifest.description: Converts video format and aspect ratio, e.g., from 16:9 (YouTube) to 9:16 (TikTok/Shorts).

manifest.name: Podcast Audio Enhancer
manifest.description: Applies standard audio filters (noise reduction, EQ, compression) to a podcast audio file.

manifest.name: YouTube Uploader
manifest.description: Uploads a video file to YouTube with title, description, tags, and thumbnail.

manifest.name: TikTok Uploader
manifest.description: Uploads a video file to TikTok via web, complete with caption and scheduling options.

manifest.name: Instagram Reels Uploader
manifest.description: Uploads a short video clip to Instagram Reels.

manifest.name: Multi-Platform Publisher
manifest.description: Simultaneously uploads one video content to YouTube Shorts, TikTok, and Instagram Reels.

manifest.name: Podcast Episode Publisher
manifest.description: Uploads an audio file to a podcast host (e.g., Spotify for Podcasters) and updates the RSS feed.

manifest.name: Blog Post Publisher
manifest.description: Publishes an article to WordPress or Ghost, complete with a featured image and SEO meta.

manifest.name: Bulk Post Scheduler
manifest.description: Schedules dozens of social media posts from a CSV or Google Sheets file.

manifest.name: AI Video Clipper
manifest.description: Analyzes a long YouTube video and automatically cuts it into several short, viral-style clips.

manifest.name: Video to Blog Post
manifest.description: Uses AI to transcribe a video and then transforms the transcript into a structured blog article.

manifest.name: Blog to Social Posts
manifest.description: Extracts key points from an article and converts them into a series of tweets or an Instagram carousel.

manifest.name: Video to Audiogram
manifest.description: Takes an audio clip from a video, adds a visual waveform and title, and creates a short video for social media.

manifest.name: Podcast to Carousel
manifest.description: Takes interesting quotes from a podcast transcript and turns them into a series of quote card images for Instagram.

manifest.name: AI Comment Responder
manifest.description: Analyzes the sentiment of comments (positive, negative, question) and provides draft replies.

manifest.name: YouTube Comment Heart-er
manifest.description: Automatically gives a 'heart' to all positive comments on a new video.

manifest.name: Discord Welcome Bot
manifest.description: Sends a personalized welcome message to new members on a Discord server.

manifest.name: Community Cross-Poster
manifest.description: Automatically announces new content (e.g., YouTube video) in Discord, Telegram, and a Facebook Group.

manifest.name: Negative Comment Alerter
manifest.description: Sends a notification to Telegram if a comment contains negative or spammy keywords.

manifest.name: Affiliate Link Manager
manifest.description: Checks a list of affiliate links to ensure none are broken and reports any dead links.

manifest.name: Sponsorship Report Generator
manifest.description: Collects metrics (views, likes, comments) from sponsored content and compiles them into a PDF report.

manifest.name: New Supporter Greeter
manifest.description: Sends a personal email or Discord message to new supporters on platforms like Patreon or Ko-fi.

manifest.name: Merch Store Monitor
manifest.description: Sends a notification if a new product is sold in a merch store (Shopify, Gumroad).

manifest.name: Multi-Platform Stats Fetcher
manifest.description: Fetches basic analytics data from YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram, and consolidates it in one place.

manifest.name: Weekly Performance Reporter
manifest.description: Sends a weekly performance summary to an email or Telegram every Monday morning.

manifest.name: Best Time to Post Analyzer
manifest.description: Analyzes engagement data to recommend the best hours to publish content.

manifest.name: Thumbnail A/B Tester
manifest.description: Changes a YouTube video's thumbnail after 24 hours to see if there is a change in Click-Through Rate (CTR).

manifest.name: AI Paraphraser
manifest.description: Rewrites a sentence or paragraph in a different style of language.

manifest.name: AI Headline Analyzer
manifest.description: Scores a headline based on its click potential and SEO.

manifest.name: Hashtag Generator
manifest.description: Generates relevant hashtag groups (popular, niche, brand) based on keywords.

manifest.name: Text Cleaner
manifest.description: Removes double spaces, empty lines, or strange characters from a text.

manifest.name: Profanity Filter
manifest.description: Detects and censors profane words in a text.

manifest.name: Emoji Adder
manifest.description: Automatically adds relevant emojis to social media text.

manifest.name: CSV to JSON Converter
manifest.description: Converts data from CSV format to JSON.

manifest.name: URL Shortener
manifest.description: Shortens a URL using services like Bitly or TinyURL.

manifest.name: Image Resizer
manifest.description: Resizes an image to specific dimensions (e.g., 1920x1080 for a YouTube thumbnail).

manifest.name: Image Compressor
manifest.description: Reduces the file size of an image without significant quality loss.

manifest.name: Meme Generator
manifest.description: Adds meme-style text to an image template.

manifest.name: Video Trimmer
manifest.description: Cuts a video based on start and end timestamps.

manifest.name: GIF Creator
manifest.description: Converts a short segment of a video into a GIF file.

manifest.name: Audio Extractor
manifest.description: Extracts the audio track from a video file and saves it as an MP3.

manifest.name: Social Handle Validator
manifest.description: Checks if a username is available on various social media platforms.

manifest.name: YouTube Video Downloader
manifest.description: Downloads a video from YouTube based on its URL.

manifest.name: Website Screenshot Taker
manifest.description: Takes a full-page screenshot of a webpage.

manifest.name: Meta Tag Scraper
manifest.description: Extracts the title, description, and image from an article's URL.

manifest.name: Sentiment Analysis
manifest.description: Provides a sentiment score (positive, negative, neutral) for a text.

manifest.name: Language Detector
manifest.description: Detects the language of a text.

manifest.name: Entity Recognition
manifest.description: Identifies names of people, places, or organizations in an article.

manifest.name: Affiliate Link Cloaker
manifest.description: Converts a long affiliate URL into a shorter, cleaner link.

manifest.name: Invoice Generator
manifest.description: Creates a simple PDF invoice from client data and payment amount.

manifest.name: Currency Converter
manifest.description: Converts currency values.

manifest.name: Donation Link Generator
manifest.description: Creates a quick donation URL for platforms like PayPal.Me.

manifest.name: FFmpeg Command Runner
manifest.description: Runs custom FFmpeg commands for advanced video and audio manipulation.

manifest.name: Python Script Runner
manifest.description: Executes a custom Python script written by the user.

manifest.name: JavaScript (Node.js) Runner
manifest.description: Runs a JavaScript script using Node.js.

manifest.name: Shell/Bash Script Runner
manifest.description: Executes a shell command or script on the operating system.

manifest.name: ImageMagick Runner
manifest.description: Runs ImageMagick commands for complex image manipulation.

manifest.name: cURL Command Builder
manifest.description: Builds and runs a cURL request to interact with APIs that do not have a dedicated module.

manifest.name: Browser Automation Runner
manifest.description: Runs a Puppeteer or Selenium script for complex web scraping or interaction tasks.

manifest.name: SQL Query Runner
manifest.description: Runs a SQL query on a connected database (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite).

manifest.name: Google Apps Script Executor
manifest.description: Triggers the execution of a specific function in a Google Apps Script.

manifest.name: PowerShell Script Runner
manifest.description: Executes a custom PowerShell script (particularly useful for Windows users).

manifest.name: AppleScript Runner
manifest.description: Runs an AppleScript to automate applications on macOS.

manifest.name: R Script Runner
manifest.description: Executes an R script for data analysis and visualization.

manifest.name: yt-dlp Runner
manifest.description: Runs the 'yt-dlp' command with custom arguments to download video/audio from various sites.

manifest.name: Pandas Script Runner
manifest.description: Runs a Python code snippet using the Pandas library for tabular data manipulation.

manifest.name: Jupyter Notebook Runner
manifest.description: Executes cells within a Jupyter Notebook file.

manifest.name: Schedule (Cron Job)
manifest.description: Starts a workflow at a very specific time (e.g., every Monday at 9 AM).

manifest.name: Interval
manifest.description: Starts a workflow repeatedly every X minutes, hours, or days.

manifest.name: On System Startup
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when the Flowork Engine first starts.

manifest.name: New File in Folder
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a new file is added to a specific folder.

manifest.name: File Modified
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a monitored file is modified.

manifest.name: Webhook
manifest.description: Provides a unique URL that can be called by external services to start a workflow.

manifest.name: RSS Feed Update
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when there is a new entry in an RSS feed (e.g., blog, podcast).

manifest.name: New GitHub Commit
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a new commit is made to a specific branch in a GitHub repository.

manifest.name: New YouTube Video by Channel
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a specific YouTube channel uploads a new video.

manifest.name: New Mention on X (Twitter)
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a specific account is mentioned on X.

manifest.name: New Social Follower
manifest.description: Starts a workflow upon gaining a new follower on Instagram or Twitch.

manifest.name: New Live Stream Started
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a Twitch or YouTube channel begins a live broadcast.

manifest.name: New Discord Message in Channel
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a new message is posted in a specific Discord channel.

manifest.name: New Telegram Message with Keyword
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a message containing a specific keyword is posted in a Telegram group.

manifest.name: New Reddit Post in Subreddit
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a new post is made in a monitored subreddit.

manifest.name: New Email Received
manifest.description: Checks an email inbox and starts a workflow for each new email that matches criteria (sender, subject).

manifest.name: New Trello Card Added
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a new card is added to a specific Trello list.

manifest.name: Google Calendar Event Start
manifest.description: Starts a workflow a few minutes before an event in Google Calendar begins.

manifest.name: New Sale on Platform
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when a new sale occurs on an e-commerce platform (Gumroad, Shopify).

manifest.name: New Supporter on Platform
manifest.description: Starts a workflow when someone becomes a new supporter on Patreon or Ko-fi.
